entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming north 20 near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 5 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 5 May 2023
